title: CANVAS - Commonsense-Aware Navigation System
description: A vision-language-action model for intuitive robot navigation with commonsense reasoning. Accepted at ICRA 2025 and won Outstanding Paper Award at NeurIPS 2024 Workshop.

title: D2E - Desktop to Embodied AI
description: Scaling vision-action pretraining using desktop and gaming data for transfer to physical robotics tasks. Submitted to ICLR 2026.

title: General-Purpose Foundation Model for Robotics
description: Research on developing a foundation model for robotics and autonomous driving at Maum AI, with evaluation in Nvidia Isaac simulation environments.

title: Drug Target Interaction (DTI) Model
description: Developed DTI model architecture and fine-tuning framework for international pharmaceutical corporations at Deargen Inc.
